name: mcp-research-file-server
description: Multimodal MCP File Server for Research Proposal Development

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.qdrant:reset: cd docker && docker-compose down && docker volume rm docker_qdrant_storage docker_qdrant_snapshots && docker-compose up -d qdrant

author: MCP Research Team
